Victor Soto

Mexico City · (+52) 55-6676-9310 · name@email.com

I am an experienced backend developer with expertise in Java, Spring Boot, MySQL and Microsoft Server databases. I am also skilled in using Git and have a solid understanding of front-end development, including JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and some experience with React. I am passionate about creating high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions, and am always looking for new challenges to help me grow as a developer.

Experience

Software Engineer

Unosquare

As a software developer at Unosquare, I collaborated with American clients to design, develop, and maintain software solutions using Java, databases, and other tools. My role involved analyzing business requirements, writing high-quality, scalable, and maintainable code, performing testing and debugging, and ensuring project timelines and quality standards were met. I also researched new technologies and industry trends, provided technical guidance and support to colleagues and clients, and contributed to the continuous improvement of development processes and best practices at Unosquare.

August 2022 - Present

Junior Java Fullstack Developer

Generation Mexico

I completed the Java Junior Fullstack Web Development program at Generation Mexico, which provided me with intensive, hands-on training in Java and fullstack web development. Through the program, I gained practical skills in areas such as developing and testing web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and other technologies, creating and managing relational databases with MySQL, and designing and implementing front-end user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The program also helped me develop essential soft skills, such as teamwork, problem-solving, and communication. With the support of Generation Mexico, I was able to secure a job in the field and continue to build on my skills and experience as a web developer.

March 2022 - June 2022

Geophysical Engineer

Geoexplora

As a data processing specialist at Geoexplora, I collaborated with geoscientists and other technical experts to ensure that data was accurately processed and analyzed, and helped develop and implement new data processing workflows and methodologies. In addition, I was responsible for creating and managing Bash scripts to automate various data processing and analysis tasks, which helped improve efficiency and accuracy. My role also involved troubleshooting technical issues and providing technical support to colleagues as needed. Through this experience, I developed strong technical skills in data processing, analysis, and management, as well as proficiency in Bash scripting and problem-solving.

March 2021 - March 2022

Interests

In my free time, I enjoy a variety of activities outside of software development. I am an avid gamer, and enjoy both console and PC games. I also enjoy spending time outdoors, taking my dog for walks and playing fetch. Another hobby of mine is bowling, which I find to be a great way to relax and socialize.

Finally, I have a passion for stargazing, and often enjoy camping trips to remote locations where the skies are clear and the stars are bright.
